Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. For this opportunity, I am offering it to you for $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusivity and the high demand for this item. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
